dict.string: • The Switches Widget can be invoked via Activator or it can be pinned to the Homescreen.
• Touch and drag to move it anywhere on the screen.
• There are toggless for Wifi, Bluetooth, Location, Do Not Disturb, and Auto-Brightness.
• Pressing these toggles will change them to On or Off depending on the state they are currently in.
• If the glyph for a toggle is white, that means it is On, and if it is a light gray color that means it is Off.
• Hold anywhere on the Switches Widget to center it to the middle of the screen.
